mapper.select: SELECT customer.WeChatCustomerID, customer.PersonID, customer.OriginalWechatID, customer.UpdatedWechatID, customer.Alias, customer.Tag, customer.WeChatAddedDateTime, customer.RecordedDateTime, customer.RecorderID, customer.WeChatCustomerActivitySourceID, customer.WeChatCustomerAddingSourceID, customer.TitleID, customer.Affiliation, customer.ResearchFields, customer.CustomerPhoneNumber, customer.CommentForCustomer, customer.WeChatCustomerEvaluationID, customer.Remark, person.FirstName, activity.Source activity_source, adding.Source adding_source, title.Title, evaluation.Evaluation,wechat.OperationWechatID, wechat.WechatNo, MIN(link.OrderID) FROM t_we_chat_customer customer JOIN t_person person ON customer.RecorderID = person.personID JOIN t_wechat_customer_activity_source activity ON customer.WeChatCustomerActivitySourceID = activity.WeChatCustomerActivitySourceID JOIN t_wechat_customer_adding_source adding ON customer.WeChatCustomerAddingSourceID = adding.WeChatCustomerAddingSourceID JOIN t_title title ON customer.TitleID = title.TitleID LEFT JOIN t_we_chat_customer_evaluation evaluation ON customer.WeChatCustomerEvaluationID = evaluation.WeChatCustomerEvaluationID LEFT JOIN t_operation_wechat_customer link ON customer.WeChatCustomerID = link.WeChatCustomerID LEFT JOIN t_operation_wechat wechat ON link.OperationWechatID = wechat.OperationWechatID

SELECT wechat.OperationWechatID id, wechat.WechatNo name FROM t_we_chat_customer customer JOIN t_operation_wechat_customer link ON link.WeChatCustomerID = customer.WeChatCustomerID JOIN t_operation_wechat wechat ON link.OperationWechatID = wechat.OperationWechatID
customer.WeChatCustomerID = #{_parameter}
